Key Match Events: Zack Wheeler fired seven scoreless innings in a 3-0 Phillies win that extended their National League East lead to six games.
Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predicted a close game between the two rival teams.
Post-Match Reflections: Rob Thomson said. “The brighter the lights, the better the command gets.”
Zack Wheeler said. “I just pride myself on big games and big moments.”
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies have won 31 straight games when their starter has gone seven.
Wheeler has a 2.07 ERA in 104 1/3 innings against Atlanta since joining the Phillies in 2020.
Others: Zack Wheeler is open about his personal goal to win the Cy Young Award, which he lost to Corbin Burnes in 2021 despite throwing 46 1/3 more innings than Burnes.
